name: Revenge of the magic hat
description:
You are a stage magician, but instead of entertaining an audience, today, you are FIGHTING FOR YOUR LIFE!

Your trusty magic top-hat is seeking REVENGE and has recruited all your magic tricks as weapons . . . your fate lies with the ROLL OF THE DICE.

*CONTROLS*

WASD:   move

Left Click:   throw card

Space:   Roll/stop dice

Music by SketchyLogic
